title: Fragment, 1750–99
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
description: Olive green satin ground. Broad ribbon-like white serpentine crossing another serpentine of rose and pink twisted ribbon.  Small building and colonnade, and trees in ribbon.  Floral sprays in other serpentine.  Large floral sprays branch out from serpentines. Brocading in ose, pin, yellow, green, brown, red white silks and peach frise silk.  Right sevage present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1750–99.
1750–99. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft. Gift of Georges A. Glaenzer. 1899-5-9-a.
